comments.body: This could be useful to users, but it should be documented if public.  @yanboliang Did you and @mengxr intend this to be public?

@jkbradley I vote for private at present. Users will care about `coefficientStandardErrors`, `tValues` and `pValues` which are calculated by `diagInvAtWA`. Meanwhile users can not get `diagInvAtWA` at R by public interface. @mengxr
I think it should be private.
